metadata.title: CVE-2021-23971 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
When processing a redirect with a conflicting Referrer-Policy, Firefoxwould have adopted the redirect's Referrer-Policy. This would havepotentially resulted in more information than intended by the originalorigin being provided to the destination of the redirect. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 86.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23971` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 86.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 86.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 86.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '86.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
